answers.author: Karen Walz-Fuentes
answers.text:
The Northern Virginia Regional Park Authority has a park with a zipline and it is run by a contractor.  
NVRPA's contact information is:
Northern Virginia Regional Park Authority Headquarters 
5400 Ox Road • Fairfax Station, Virginia 22039 • Phone: 703-352-5900 • FAX: 703-273-0905 • Email: Feedback@NVRPA.org 
The link to Hemlock Overlook Park, where the zip line is located, is http://www.nvrpa.org/park/hemlock_overlook/

answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Jared – below are a couple leads for a city (Durango CO) that recently approved a new zip line concession company to operate in their city and one city that is preparing to operate a zip line concession service (Morganton NC):  
The City of Durango, CO just approved a company to operate a new paintball park and zip line Adventure Park in the city.  If you’re interested, contact Ron LeBlanc, City Manager and let him know the Alliance (Pam) referred you.  Here is Ron’s contact information:  
Mr. Ronald (Ron) LeBlanc   
City Manager   
City of Durango, CO  
(970) 375-5005   
leblancrp@ci.durango.co.us  
www.durangogov.org  
May 2010 News Clip - Morganton NC - The Morganton Parks and Recreation Foundation announced Thursday it will buy recreational adventure equipment that will include a zip line tour, playground and climbing wall -  http://www2.morganton.com/news/2010/mar/28/rec-foundation-will-pay-bring-zip-line-morganton-ar-69102/
The Morganton NC Park and Rec Director is Gary Leonhardt, (828) 438-5350 and the department website is http://www.ci.morganton.nc.us/index.php/departments/parks-and-recreation-dept-menu 
Hope this is helpful!  
Pam  
Pamela Muse  
Western Regional Director  
Alliance for Innovation  
888-468-6450  
pmuse@transformgov.org  
www.transformgov.org

author: Jared Wilson
text:
Hi,
Looking for information from another agency that offers a zip line type concession in one of its parks or facilities.
If you allow a concessionaire to offer a zip line attraction, any of the following information would be greatly appreciated:
-RFP for Concessionaire
-Agreement between agency and concessionaire
-Any additional safety or insurance details regarding the agreement
Thanks!
Jared
City of Tempe
title: Request for Information on Zip Line type Concession
